short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes annoying promoted job listings from CVbankas and shows a number of listings removed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pašalink CVbankas iškeltus skelbimus.
VIP Skelbimai bus nematomi ✌️

Description:
Say goodbye to annoying promoted job listings with "Cvbankas be reklamos"! This extension is designed to enhance your job search experience on CVbankas by automatically removing promoted job advertisements, allowing you to focus on the opportunities that matter most to you.

Features:

Automatic Ad Removal: Instantly remove promoted job listings on CVbankas, helping you find the best job opportunities without distractions.
Real-time Updates: The extension continuously monitors the job list and ensures promoted ads are removed as soon as they appear.
Clean Interface: Enjoy a cleaner, more streamlined browsing experience on CVbankas.
Persistent Settings: Your preferences are saved, ensuring a consistent experience every time you visit CVbankas.
Easy to Use: Simply install the extension, and it will work seamlessly in the background, improving your job search experience without any additional setup.
Custom Notification: Get a real-time notification at the bottom right of your screen indicating the number of promoted jobs removed, with a link to more job opportunities at Geresnisvariantas.lt.
How it Works:

Install "Cvbankas be reklamos" from the Chrome Web Store.
Visit CVbankas at any of the following URLs: https://www.cvbankas.lt, https://en.cvbankas.lt, https://ua.cvbankas.lt, https://ru.cvbankas.lt.
The extension will automatically detect and remove promoted job listings.
A notification will appear in the bottom-right corner of your screen, informing you how many promoted jobs were removed and providing a link to Geresnisvariantas.lt for more opportunities.
Why Choose Cvbankas be reklamos?

Focus on Relevant Jobs: Eliminate distractions from promoted ads and concentrate on genuine job listings.
Enhanced User Experience: Simplify your job search process with a cleaner and more user-friendly interface.
Stay Updated: Never miss out on new job listings due to promoted ads overshadowing them.
Start your distraction-free job search today with "Cvbankas be reklamos"! Install now and take the first step towards a more efficient and enjoyable job search experience.

Support:
For any questions or feedback, please contact us at naujas@geresnisvariantas.lt.
